text: Pangkor is a state constituency in Perak, Malaysia, that has been represented in the Perak State Legislative Assembly. The state constituency was first contested in 1974 and is mandated to return a single Assemblyman to the Perak State Legislative Assembly under the first-past-the-post voting system. , the State Assemblyman for Pangkor is Zambry Abd Kadir from the United Malays National Organisation (UMNO), which is part of the Barisan National coalition,(BN); who is a former Menteri Besar. == Definition == The Pangkor constituency boasts area of Manjung district that famous for tourism industry including township of Lumut, Marina Island, Teluk Batik, Damai Laut and Pangkor Island. The largest demographic voters for the constituency comes from naval base of TLDM. It contains the polling districts of Damar Laut, Lumut, Teluk Muroh, Pengkalan TLDM, Sungai Pinang Besar, Sungai Pinang Kechil, Pasir Bogak, Pekan Pangkor,and Telok Gedong. == Demographics == {| class="wikitable sortable" |+Total electors by polling district in 2016 !Polling district !Electors |- |Damar Laut | align="right" |1,186 |- |Lumut | align="right" |1,011 |- |Telok Muroh | align="right" |1,561 |- |Pengkalan TLDM | align="right" |14,067 |- |Sungai Pinang Besar | align="right" |1,652 |- |Sungai Pinang Kechil | align="right" |2,072 |- |Pasir Bogak | align="right" |1,582 |- |Pekan Pangkor | align="right" |1,795 |- |Telok Gedong | align="right" |1,240 |- | style="background: #f2f2f2" |Total | style="background: #f2f2f2" align="right" |26,166 |- | colspan="2" align="right" |Source: Malaysian Election Commission |} == History == {| class="wikitable" ! colspan="4" |Perak State Legislative Assemblyman for Pangkor |- !Assembly !Years !Member !Party |- ! colspan="4" align="center" |Constituency created |- |9th |1995 – 1999 |Mohamad Wajdi Ishak |BN (UMNO) |- |10th |1999 – 2004 |Mohamad Wajdi Ishak |BN (UMNO) |- |11th |2004 – 2008 |Zambry Abdul Kadir |BN (UMNO) |- |12th |2008 – 2013 |Zambry Abdul Kadir |BN (UMNO) |- |13th |2013 – 2018 |Zambry Abdul Kadir |BN (UMNO) |- |14th |2018 – |Zambry Abdul Kadir |BN (UMNO) |} == Election results == The electoral results for the Pangkor state constituency in 2008, 2013 and 2018 are as follows. == See also == * Constituencies of Perak ==References== Category:Constituencies in Malaysia Category:Perak state constituencies
